com.squareup.picasso
Interface Downloader

All Known Implementing Classes:
OkHttpDownloader, UrlConnectionDownloader
public interface Downloader

A mechanism to load images from external resources such as a disk cache and/or the internet.

Nested Class Summary
static class Downloader.Response
          Response stream or bitmap and info.
static class Downloader.ResponseException
          Thrown for non-2XX responses.
 
Method Summary
 Downloader.Response load(android.net.Uri uri, boolean localCacheOnly)
          Download the specified image url from the internet.
 

Method Detail

load

Downloader.Response load(android.net.Uri uri,
                         boolean localCacheOnly)
                         throws IOException
Download the specified image url from the internet.

Parameters:
uri - Remote image URL.
localCacheOnly - If true the URL should only be loaded if available in a local disk cache.
Returns:
Downloader.Response containing either a Bitmap representation of the request or an InputStream for the image data. null can be returned to indicate a problem loading the bitmap.
Throws:
IOException - if the requested URL cannot successfully be loaded.
